CLOSED_WORLD - Static variable in class ibis.ipl.IbisCapabilities

COMMUNICATION_FIFO - Static variable in class ibis.ipl.PortType
This capability describes that messages from a sendport are delivered to the receiveport(s) in the order in which they were sent.
COMMUNICATION_NUMBERED - Static variable in class ibis.ipl.PortType
This capability describes that messages are given global sequence numbers so that the application can order them.
COMMUNICATION_RELIABLE - Static variable in class ibis.ipl.PortType
This capability describes that communication is reliable.
COMMUNICATION_RELIABLE_UNSAFE - Static variable in class ibis.ipl.PortType
This capability describes that communication is reliable but not safe enough to use on open networks.
COMMUNICATION_UNRELIABLE - Static variable in class ibis.ipl.PortType
This capability describes that communication is unreliable.

CONNECTION_DIRECT - Static variable in class ibis.ipl.PortType
This capability describes that -only- direct connection setup is used.
CONNECTION_DOWNCALLS - Static variable in class ibis.ipl.PortType
This capability describes that connection downcalls are supported.
CONNECTION_LIGHT - Static variable in class ibis.ipl.PortType
This capability describes that lightweight connection setup is used.
CONNECTION_MANY_TO_MANY - Static variable in class ibis.ipl.PortType
This capability describes that a sendport can have multiple outgoing connections, and receiveports can have multiple incoming connections.
CONNECTION_MANY_TO_ONE - Static variable in class ibis.ipl.PortType
This capability describes that a sendport can have at most one outgoing connection, but receiveports can have multiple incoming connections.
CONNECTION_ONE_TO_MANY - Static variable in class ibis.ipl.PortType
This capability describes that a sendport can have more than one outgoing connection, but receiveports can only have one incoming connection.
CONNECTION_ONE_TO_ONE - Static variable in class ibis.ipl.PortType
This capability describes that a sendport can have at most one outgoing connection, and a receiveport can have at most one incoming connection.
CONNECTION_TIMEOUT - Static variable in class ibis.ipl.PortType
This capability describes that timeouts on connection attempts are supported.
CONNECTION_ULTRALIGHT - Static variable in class ibis.ipl.PortType
This capability describes that ultra-lightweight connection setup is used.
CONNECTION_UPCALLS - Static variable in class ibis.ipl.PortType
This capability describes that connection upcalls are supported.

I

Ibis - Interface in ibis.ipl
The starting point of all Ibis communication, created using the IbisFactory.
ibis.ipl - package ibis.ipl
This package describes the Ibis Portability Layer (IPL), which is to be implemented by Ibis implementations.
ibis.ipl.server - package ibis.ipl.server
This package describes the Server for the IPL.
IbisCapabilities - Class in ibis.ipl
This class describes the capabilities of an ibis instance.

IbisException - Exception in ibis.ipl
